name: Spiritual Swords of Revealing Light
desc: Once per attack, when an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can pay 1000 LP; negate that attack. During your opponent's turn: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; this turn, your opponent's monsters cannot attack directly.
str2: Banish Spiritual Swords of Revealing Light
